title: Infinity-Edge Pool! Some Credit Issues Ok...Walkable To Fine Dining!
posting_body: With our 9-foot ceilings, oversized soaking tubs, granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, and modern aesthetic in every studio, one, or two bedroom home, you have every reason to welcome yourself home to a new luxury Oak Lawn apartment.
Realize what true luxury means when you unwind in our refreshing infinity-edge pool.
Use our exclusive bridge to the Katy Trail to enjoy nature in the heart of Uptown Dallas, TX.
With our close proximity to I-35E and the Dallas North Tollway, your commute becomes simple.
Nearby coffee shops include Cafe Express, Starbucks and Bread Winners Cafe.
There are 115 restaurants within a 15 minute walk including Avanti, i Fratelli Pizza Uptown and Texas de Brazil.
Please call Desiree with Dash Apartment locators!
